m_szDocTitle: SAITH unveils a helicopter - NewsDay Zimbabwe
m_szDocSumamry: You are here: Home › Business › SAITH unveils a helicopter SAITH unveils a helicopter SAITH Technology has unveiled its latest technologies including an electric car and hybrid helicopter, but said it was waiting government approval to sell the products. BY TARISAI MANDIZHA Speaking at the official unveiling of SAITH Technologies in Harare yesterday, founder and inventor Sangulani Max Chikumbutso said the government had shown interest in the hybrid helicopter which can be used by the army, police patrol, surveying and border patrols among others. “This event means that we are now ready for the
